text:
Futureproof - London, UK - Full Time

Futureproof is an end-to-end, creative marketing agency currently growing its digital team. We are looking for a frontend developer (with PHP experience) to be the heart of our expanding department. To start immediately.

Full details of the role and our clients here: http://www.futureproof.co.uk/jobs/php-backendfrontend-develo...

For more details, or to send CVs, email: jobs@futureproof.co.uk

We are also looking expand our pool of freelance developers, and occasionally take on interns, so do send us your details, if you're interested.
